attributes.action: Renegotiate the UK / EU deal without enacting Article 51
attributes.additional_details: In response the the 2016 EU Referendum in the UK.
attributes.background:
Satisfy both UK Leave and Remain voters' concerns and beliefs, without need to destabilise the economy and risk recession. 

Stabilise the pound and financial markets via certainty of on-going access to the single market in a reformed EU.
